title: The History of Brown Brothers Harriman
itunes:title: The History of Brown Brothers Harriman
description:
Author Zachary Karabell discusses his book "Inside Money: Brown Brothers Harriman and the American Way of Power" and explains why the financial firm is an example of sustainable capitalism.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
